text: Need Brooklyn Edwards for Mad Mex campaign. Budget around $4,292, looking for 3 x Pinterest pin, 3 x 15-second TikTok, 3 x 90-second product demo, 2 x Instagram story, 3 x LinkedIn post. 5 week exclus from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 9 months. Engagement period: 3 months.
